view.renderEngine

Class MasterRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.renderEngine.MasterRenderer

  • public class MasterRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Master renderer handles all delegations to the individual render class.
    Author:
    Marcel van Workum - 300313949
    See Also:
    EntityRenderer, GuiRenderer, TerrainRenderer, SkyboxRenderer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int RENDER_DISTANCE
      Used in the calculate as to which entities need to be rendered to the screen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MasterRenderer()
      Constructor

      Prepares the display for enabling culling, creating the transformationMatrix and creating the separate Renderers

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanUp()
      Delegate to the shaders to clean themselves up

      Disabled Culling of the vertex back-faces

      static void updateFog()
      Updates the fog colour based on the game time
